short_summary: Contract to provide HVAC maintenance services and necessary tools, services, materials, travel and labor.
full_summary:
HVAC Maintenance Services for the Canadian Embassy in Haiti
==============================================

**Tender Reference Number**
----------------------------
WS4108650864

**Tender Title and Description**
-------------------------------
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids to provide maintenance services for the heating, ventilation, and air conditioning (HVAC) systems at the Canadian Embassy in Port-au-Prince, Haiti. Services must comply with the requirements outlined in the Statement of Work.

**Submission and Evaluation**
---------------------------

* Bid submission closing time: November 14th, 2023 at 14:00 EST
* All bids submitted after 14:00 EST may be declared non-responsive
* Mandatory Microsoft Teams virtual call: November 1, 2023 at 9:00am EST
* Bidders must confirm attendance and provide the name(s) of the person(s) who will attend by October 26th, 2023 at 14:00 EST

**Tender Requirements**
------------------------

* Provide HVAC maintenance services, including tools, materials, travel, and labor, in accordance with the Statement of Work
* Comply with security requirements associated with this tender
* Collaborate with the Contracting Authority through Microsoft Teams, if required

**Contracting Information**
---------------------------

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address:
    * 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
    * Gatineau, Quebec
    * K1A 0S5
* Contact Person:
    * Stefan Ruest
    * stefan.ruest@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
    * Phone: (insert phone number)
    * Fax: (insert fax number)

**Additional Information**
-------------------------

* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Regions of Opportunity: Haiti
* Regions of Delivery: Haiti

Note: The original text contained extraneous information that has been omitted in the rewritten entry. A summary of key information is provided to ensure the tender announcement meets essential requirements.
